Invalidate the refresh token and logout the user

get.description: Returns the list of supported export formats
Get all filaments accessible to the user (global + user's own)
Get all global filaments (not owned by any user)
Get all filaments owned by the authenticated user
Get a filament by its ID

delete.description: Delete a filament (only user's own filaments)

post.description: Creates a new energy or machine preset (admin only)

get.description: Retrieves energy presets, optionally filtered by location
Retrieves all available locations for energy presets

put.description: Updates an existing preset by key (admin only)

delete.description: Deletes a preset by key (admin only)

Exports a quote and its calculation results as JSON
Exports a quote and its calculation results as PDF

get.description: Returns the current system status (OS, CPU, memory, GPU, storage, server)
Retrieves a paginated list of users with optional search filtering (admin only)

parameters.description: Search term for username, email, first name, or last name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Creates a new user account (admin only)

get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieves a user by their ID (admin can get any user, users can get themselves)

patch.description: Updates user information (admin can update any user, users can update themselves with restrictions)
Enables or disables a user account (admin only)

post.description: Adds a role to a user (admin only)

delete.description: Removes a role from a user (admin only)

get.description: Get all quotes belonging to the authenticated user
get.summary: Get all quotes for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new quote with filament lines and profiles

get.description: Get a quote by ID with all its filament lines and profiles

put.description: Update a quote with new data

delete.description: Delete a quote and all its related data

post.description: Calculate all costs for a quote based on provided parameters
Create a copy of an existing quote

filament_snapshot_name.description: Option 2: Manual snapshot data (required if filament_id not provided)
